summary: Updated Testimonials section: Right-aligned all text elements (title, names, text). Fixed card backgrounds - Card 2 (محمد) now uses transparent background to show pink page background, Cards 1 and 3 keep white background. Added avatar icons (Group 268, 270, 271/269) with SVG placeholders matching Figma dimensions. All elements now have text-align: right and dir='rtl' for proper RTL layout.
current_status: Testimonials section updated with right-aligned text, correct backgrounds (Card 2 transparent), and avatar icons. Ready for browser testing.
